headline: EOG Resources to Present at Upcoming Conference
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (EOG) is scheduled to present at the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech and Utilities Conference at 2:40 p.m. Central time (3:40 p.m. Eastern time) on Tuesday, January 7. Ann Janssen, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will present on behalf of EOG.

headline: Buffett Goofed by Selling Apple Stock Instead of Occidental, but All Isn’t Lost
summary: Berkshire Hathaway CEO Warren Buffett left money on the table by cutting the stake in Apple, but Occidental Petroleum still has a shot at pulling out of the ditch.

raw.headline: Buffett Goofed by Selling Apple Stock Instead of Occidental, but All Isn’t Lost

headline: Here's Why Hold Strategy is Apt for EOG Resources Stock Now
summary: Favorable oil prices are aiding EOG. However, as an upstream company, it is highly exposed to extreme volatility in commodity prices.
